_header: Is there any good man here
_description: A Minstrel’s Greeting — six 8-line stanzas (aaabcccb) and 3-line burden: ‘Bon jowre bon jowre a vous / I am cum vnto this hows / Vith par la pompe I say’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Is þer any good man hereÞat will make me any
                    chere…
OxfBal354.Facsimiles:
Early Manuscripts at Oxford University: Facsimile
                    of Oxford, Balliol MS 354.
